text:
Kiva | Software Engineer and DevOps | Fulltime | Onsite | San Francisco, CA

We're hiring someone who wants to make the world a better place with us through working on the code that servers www.kiva.org. We're a non-profit helping to alleviate poverty through connecting lenders to borrowers across the world and here at home. We offer awesome benefits including a partner trip to anywhere we work for a week to meet our borrowers and partners. We're looking for people with either strong Javascript skills for our front-end position or DevOps candidates with strong AWS skills for our Ops position. If those aren't your thing then we're also going to be hiring for back-end engineers, especially those with a financial systems focus, just shoot me an email and let me know!

http://kiva.org/careers
